TopicTitle: Missions porgess stuck in career mode ?!

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

after a few hours game play, mostlya around the time i get to the mun, the mission progress won't work anymore. And further more the experimental parts are still there even after i achieved all the missions goals ( in the hangar , so i can put them still on my rocktes) .

Some missions work, mostly the simple one where you jsut have to do smt on the ground landed. but even there i only can gues if i achieved all the goals, cause the checks on the to do list won't work. with more complex missions loke fly to mun, orbit , tansmit data, land, tramsit data and so on it won t work anymore. so after restarting the career mode 5 times now i m done . is there a fix ti this problem ?

cheers and thx
